title: Client not Loading
body: Everything is taking forever to load, and I'm getting the connection issues popup over and over again. I know for a fact that it isn't my internet so I don't know what's going on. I'm not able to play games cause I can't lock in champions, so I end up just dodging. Is there a reliable fix for this?

replies.body: Even if your internet is fine, you can still have problems reaching specific services.  In this case it sounds like you've got a struggling connection in champion select, and likely in-game.  You should run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Just make sure to test it in a custom game to prevent penalties.
